name: data_update
subject: Update of your login credentials
html_body:
Hello [[username]],

We inform you that your login credentials have been updated the [[date]]. If you initiated this change, you can ignore this message.

If you have not made this change, please contact support immediately. Your old login details no longer work.

– The Gravitalia security team

If you need any help, contact our support at support@gravitalia.com.
